purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-InstructionsForUseAdministeringSchedule](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-InstructionsForUseAdministeringSchedule) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.

comment.value: In practice, this means that when you define a frequency (3x a day) this flag should false, but when you define an interval (every 8 hours) you set this flag to true.
If `periodUnit` is used for Interval, only minutes (_min_) and hours (_h_) are allowed.
